person.persName: John N. B. Hardwick (Powell County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Manerva J. Hardwick. Father of James R. Hardwick, Lucy E. Hardwick, Sarah F. Hardwick, Rob M. Hardwick, Narsissus Hardwick, Martha B. Hardwick, Sandford H. Hardwick, and Mary E. Hardwick. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Powell County. Judge of the Powell County Court from 1860 to 1866.
